attributes.action: Force virgin media to open the cable network much like has been done with water/electric ect.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Alot of people would like a choice of cable providers much like we can now with bt, other isp's can use the bt lines for supply of internet so why can't other isp's offer services via the cable network?

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
